ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Nuh called out to Us and what an excellent Responder We are!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Noah had called upon Us (earlier). See, how excellent We were in answering him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Noah called for help. How blessed was the answer which he received.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Nooh prayed to Us – so what an excellent Acceptor of Prayer We are!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed Nuh invoked Us, and We are the best of those who answer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Nuh did certainly call upon Us, and most excellent answerer of prayer are We.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Noah called to Us; and how excellent were the Answerers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Noah verily prayed unto Us, and gracious was the Hearer of his prayer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Noah cried to Us, and how excellent was Our response!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly Nuh cried Unto us; and We are the Best of answerers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly Noah called out to Us, and how well did We respond!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (In the days of old), Noah cried to Us, and We are the best to hear prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed Nuh (Noah) invoked Us, and We are the Best of those who answer (the request).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Noah called to Us, and We are the Best to answer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Noah called out to Us, and We are the Best of responders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:75]   And verily Noah called to Us, when he said, ‘My Lord: I have been overcome, so help [me] [Q. 54:10], and how excellent were the Hearers of the prayer, for him, were We: in other words he invoked Us against his people, so We destroyed them by drowning [them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Noah verily prayed unto Us) Noah prayed against his folk, saying: (My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers in the land...) [Noah, 71: 26-27], (and gracious was the Hearer of his prayer) by destroying his folk.
